_header: When Christ was born of Mary free
_description: A Christmas carol — four quatrains and burden: ‘Christo paremus cantica / In excelsis gloria’

BLHar5396.First Lines:
When cryst was born of mary freIn bedlem in þat fayre
                    cyte…
BLHar5396.Last Lines:
…[Wh]ere we may syng to the solasIn excelsis
                    gloria
BLHar5396.Note: MS damaged at the margin. Written as three lines with fourth to right.
BLHar5396.Attributed Title: Christo paremus cantica in excelsis gloria (f. 273v); above this, “A Christmas Caroll” added by a later hand
